table.name: vtiger_rsnsqlqueries
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnsqlqueries` ( `rsnsqlqueriesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `query` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, `description` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `prescript` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `executiontime` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `postscript` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnsqlqueriesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnsqlqueriescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnsqlqueriescf` ( `rsnsqlqueriesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnsqlqueriesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
